name: Ethiopia Yirgacheffe
tasting_notes: Bright and clean with distinct floral, citrus, and tea-like notes.

name: Colombia Supremo
tasting_notes: A well-balanced and smooth cup with notes of caramel, chocolate, and a hint of citrus.

name: Kenya AA Nyeri
tasting_notes: Vibrant and complex with a wine-like acidity, showcasing notes of blackcurrant, grapefruit, and florals.

name: Sumatra Mandheling
tasting_notes: Full-bodied and earthy with low acidity, featuring flavors of dark chocolate, cedar, and spice.

name: Brazil Cerrado
tasting_notes: A smooth, low-acidity coffee with prominent notes of roasted almond, dark chocolate, and caramel.

name: Guatemala Antigua
tasting_notes: Rich and velvety with a spicy flavor profile, complemented by notes of fine chocolate and caramel.

name: Costa Rica Tarraz√∫
tasting_notes: Crisp and bright with a sweet citrus finish and hints of milk chocolate and honey.

name: Panama Geisha
tasting_notes: Exquisitely floral and delicate, with a complex profile of jasmine, bergamot, and tropical fruits.

name: Ethiopia Sidamo Guji
tasting_notes: Sweet and fruity with dominant notes of blueberry, strawberry jam, and a creamy body.

name: Honduras Marcala
tasting_notes: A balanced and sweet cup with notes of milk chocolate, caramel, and a soft, nutty finish.

name: Rwanda Kivu
tasting_notes: Bright and juicy with flavors of red apple, orange zest, and a hint of baking spice.

name: Mexico Chiapas
tasting_notes: A smooth, medium-bodied coffee with notes of milk chocolate, roasted nuts, and a hint of lemon.

name: Peru Cajamarca
tasting_notes: Sweet and mellow with a creamy body, featuring notes of brown sugar, almond, and a touch of green apple.

name: Tanzania Peaberry
tasting_notes: A bright and vibrant cup with a rich body and notes of blackberry, lemon, and a chocolatey finish.

name: Nicaragua Jinotega
tasting_notes: A well-rounded coffee with a medium body and flavors of dark chocolate, plum, and a hint of spice.

name: India Cherry AA Robusta
tasting_notes: Intensely bold and full-bodied with a powerful dark chocolate and nutty flavor, low acidity and a smooth finish.

name: Classic Italian Espresso Blend
tasting_notes: A classic punchy and satisfying espresso with notes of dark chocolate, praline, and rich caramel.

name: El Salvador Pacamara
tasting_notes: Sweet and complex with a creamy mouthfeel, offering notes of tropical fruit, honey, and a hint of savory herbs.

name: Burundi Kayanza
tasting_notes: A delicate and bright cup with notes of green tea, red currant, and a lingering floral sweetness.

name: Yemen Mocha
tasting_notes: An ancient and complex coffee with a wild, winey acidity and notes of dark chocolate, cinnamon, and dried fruit.

name: Jamaica Blue Mountain
tasting_notes: Famously smooth and mild with a clean taste, well-balanced with a slightly sweet flavor and no bitterness.

name: Hawaii Kona
tasting_notes: A smooth, delicate coffee with a rich aroma, featuring notes of milk chocolate, brown sugar, and a hint of tropical fruit.

name: Papua New Guinea Sigri
tasting_notes: A medium-bodied coffee with a syrupy mouthfeel and savory-sweet notes of dark chocolate, dried fruit, and a hint of herbs.

name: Bolivia Caranavi
tasting_notes: A clean and crisp cup with a bright, citrusy acidity and notes of caramel, green apple, and jasmine.

name: Colombia Pink Bourbon
tasting_notes: A complex and floral coffee with high acidity, featuring notes of hibiscus, red berries, and a honey-like sweetness.

name: Uganda Bugisu
tasting_notes: A rich, full-bodied coffee with winey acidity and deep notes of dark chocolate, fig, and cedar.

name: India Monsooned Malabar
tasting_notes: A unique, heavy-bodied coffee with a pungent, earthy flavor profile, low acidity, and notes of baker's chocolate and spice.

name: Vietnam Lam Dong
tasting_notes: A balanced and clean cup with notes of milk chocolate, almond, a hint of orange, and a smooth finish.

name: India Kaapi Royale
tasting_notes: A high-quality robusta with a clean cup profile, featuring rich cocoa powder notes and a hint of nuttiness.

name: Ethiopia Harrar
tasting_notes: A bold and winey coffee with a heavy body and complex notes of dark berries, chocolate, and a spicy, earthy finish.

name: Aceh Gayo
tasting_notes: A full-bodied and earthy cup with notes of dark chocolate, brown sugar, and a hint of herbal spice. [3, 20]

name: Sulawesi Toraja
tasting_notes: Deep and brooding with a silky body, featuring flavors of dark chocolate, ripe fruit, and a warm, spicy finish. [4, 8, 14]

name: Bali Kintamani
tasting_notes: A smooth and clean cup with a bright, citrusy acidity and sweet notes of orange, chocolate, and a hint of molasses. [7, 12, 26]

name: Flores Bajawa
tasting_notes: A unique profile with a syrupy body, floral aroma, and distinct notes of bittersweet chocolate, licorice, and a nutty finish. [18, 29, 42]

name: Papua Wamena
tasting_notes: A balanced and smooth coffee with a strong body, featuring notes of chocolate, caramel, and a clean, herbal finish. [2, 5, 10]

name: Sumatra Lintong
tasting_notes: A classic Sumatran profile with a heavy, syrupy body, low acidity, and deep notes of cedar, spice, and black licorice. [6, 11, 13]

name: Java Preanger
tasting_notes: A legacy coffee with a full body, mild acidity, and a flavor profile of milk chocolate, roasted nuts, and a hint of malt. [43, 47, 48]

name: Sumatra Kerinci
tasting_notes: A vibrant and complex cup with a syrupy body, showcasing bright notes of passionfruit, kiwi, and milk chocolate. [36, 39]

name: Gayo Wine Coffee
tasting_notes: A rare coffee with a unique extended fermentation, resulting in a wine-like acidity, with bold notes of red berries and rich chocolate. [38]

name: Java Robusta
tasting_notes: A strong and bold cup with a thick body, dominated by flavors of bitter chocolate, nuts, and a subtle spicy finish. [41]

name: Sumatra Mandheling
tasting_notes: A classic Indonesian coffee with a smooth, full body, low acidity, and rich, complex notes of dark chocolate, cedar, and herbs.
